snippet: Jurors determined that software that lets companies manage BlackBerry devices remotely infringed Mformation’s patents.
abstract: BlackBerry maker Research in Motion is found liable for $147.2 million in damages for infringing software patents held by Mformation Technologies.
lead_paragraph: Jurors determined that software that lets companies manage BlackBerry devices remotely infringed Mformation’s patents.
